access_token.name: Outh2 Access Token
access_token.description_line1: Runs a test call to your microsoft online tenant id and retrieves the tokens
access_token.description_line2: Runs a test call to your microsoft online tenant id and retrieves the tokens

recommendationlist.name: Azure List of Recommendations
recommendationlist.command_comments: Displays the list of recommendations that Azure utilizes

recommendation.name: Azure Recommendations
recommendation.command_comments: Displays the list of recommendations based on your subscription

resourcegroups.name: Azure Retrieves all Resource Groups
resourcegroups.command_comments: Displays the list of resource groups in a subscription
resourcegroups.description_line1: Retrieves a list of resource group names
resourcegroups.description_line2: Each resource is tied to a subscription from your config file

resourcegroupcost.name: Azure Retrieves all Resource with Consumption
resourcegroupcost.command_comments: Displays the list of resource groups with detailed consumption
resourcegroupcost.description_line1: Retrieves a list of resource group names with detailed consumption
resourcegroupcost.description_line2: Each resource is tied to a subscription from your config file. The resource will contain cost and type

resourcegroupusage.name: Azure Retrieves all Resource with Usage
resourcegroupusage.command_comments: Displays the list of resource groups with detailed usage
resourcegroupusage.description_line1: Retrieves a list of resource group names with detailed usage
